channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘For All Mankind’ Season 5 Gets A Close Release Date, First Trailer
item.description: We now have a release date for For All Mankind season 5 on Apple TV and it is closer than you might have imagined. Plus, a new trailer.

item.title: Chinese Auto Sales In Europe Could Peak At 15% - Report

item.title: Everybody Stay Calm, ‘The Office’s Michael And Dwight Are Coming To ‘Fortnite’
item.description: Fortnite is bringing in Michael Scott and Dwight Schrute to the game, a collab that is one of its more unexpected ones in its history.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Thursday, January 22
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.
